Style/StringLiterals.description:
Description

Checks if uses of quotes match the configured preference.
Style/StringLiterals.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: single_quotes (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['single_quotes', 'double_quotes'] (type: list)
ConsistentQuotesInMultiline: False (type: bool)
